<script type="text/html" id="schema-product__price-template">

        <!-- ko if: $root.activeSegment() !== 'new' && $data.second.offers_count -->

                   data-bind="{attr: {href: $data.html_url + '/used'}}">
                    <span data-bind="{text: 'от ' + $data.second.min_price.amount.replace('.', ',') + 'р.'}"></span>
                </a>
            </div>
            <div class="schema-product__offers">
                <a class="schema-product__button button button_white"
                   data-bind="{attr: {href: $data.html_url + '/used'}}">
                    <span class="schema-product__adverts-value"
                          data-bind="{html: $data.second.offers_count + ' б/у'}">
                    </span>
                    <span class="schema-product__adverts-sign"
                          data-bind="{text: $root.format.pluralForm($data.second.offers_count, ['объявление', 'объявления', 'объявлений'])}">
                     </span>
                </a>
            </div>
        </div>
        <!-- /ko -->
    <!-- /ko -->

    <!-- ko if: $data.status === 'new' -->
    <div class="schema-product__line">
        <div class="schema-product__status">Скоро в&nbsp;продаже</div>
    </div>
    <!-- /ko -->

    <!-- ko if: $data.status === 'active' -->

            <!-- ko if: $root.activeSegment() !== 'second' && $data.offers -->

                <div class="schema-product__price">
                    <a data-bind="attr: {href: $data.prices.html_url}" class="schema-product__price-value schema-product__price-value_primary">

                    </a>
                </div>

                       data-bind="attr: {href: $data.prices.html_url, title: 'Сравнение предложений на ' + $data.full_name},
                                  text: $data.offers + ' ' + $root.format.pluralForm($data.offers, ['предложение', 'предложения', 'предложений'])"

                </div>
            </div>
            <!-- /ko -->

            <!-- ko if: $root.activeSegment() !== 'new' && $data.second.offers_count -->

                    <a class="schema-product__price-value schema-product__price-value_secondary"

                       <span data-bind="{text: 'от ' + $data.second.min_price.amount.replace('.', ',') + 'р.'}"></span>
                    </a>
                </div>

                       data-bind="{attr: {href: $data.html_url + '/used'}}">

                              data-bind="{html: $data.second.offers_count + ' б/у'}">
                        </span>
                        <span class="schema-product__adverts-sign"

                        </span>
                    </a>
                </div>
            </div>
            <!-- /ko -->
